Pre-Game Insights: Bafana Bafana head coach Hugo Broos has made one change with Iqraam Rayners replacing Lyle Foster in attack for their 2025 AFCON Qualifier second leg clash against Congo Brazzaville.
Miscellaneous Highlights: South Africa showed no mercy to the Congolese in a one-sided first leg affair at the Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium in Gqeberha on Friday, running out convincing 5-0 victors.
Others: With a win today, Bafana would move to 10 points from four games and open a seven-point gap to Congo Brazzaville, ultimately booking their ticket for next yearâ€™s AFCON.
